ANML

Citrix

Citrix is a global leader in mobile workspaces, providing virtualization, networking and cloud services for over 330,000 organizations across the world. ANML worked with Citrix to design an immersive blog experience for their unique audience of customers, experts, and employees. We created a modular grid system with a focus on accessibility to improve post discovery and make content shine on every device.

Built to focus
on what matters

The Citrix blog is a hub for constantly-changing posts ranging numerous topics, products, and languages. We created a clear visual heirarchy to drive users to relevant content, getting them into posts instead of wondering where to go next.

Increased engagement and discoverability

We designed blog posts with dynamic content spaces and a multitude of text styles to highlight what matters most: the content. Users can also navigate to important posts on the left at anytime, increasing post engagement and discoverability.

Consistent on
every platform

The blog’s grid was designed to be beautiful and functional across platforms, creating a coherent experience no matter how you view it.

Citrix blog looks amazing. I was so proud to see the outcome. You guys rock!
Sun LeeFormer Creative Director | Citrix

ServiceNow

Roads & Kingdoms

Ernie Ball

ANML created a web experience to celebrate Ernie Ball’s commitment to artistry, innovation, and music culture.
